author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:

- Update MF regression code to use binary files from standard data path, cf. PR in cms-data;
- regression.py updated with command-line arguments to cover all possible cases. (This is intended to be added as a unit test in a next PR);
- Added consumes to DDCompactViewMFESProducer; cf. conversation in #28346

This PR replaces #28642 as per discussion therein.

#### PR validation:

Ran regression tests against earlier regression files (produced in past CMSSW releases) for all possible combinations of era, current, and MF producer type.
title: Mf regression v2
